info.name: Nextant
info.summary: Navigate through your cloud using Solr
info.description:
One to enable a full text search within your cloud.
- When uploaded to the cloud, text and pdf file are extracted to the Solr Server. - It add an owner filter to solr documents so each user search in its own library. - Use the Solr server when using the searchbox in the files App of your nextcloud. - You can also extract your current files using ./occ nextant:scan
info.author: Maxence Lange
